# Dash 2.0 - AI Agent Platform
> The Only Agentic AI OS Your Enterprise Will Ever Need

## About
Dash is a privacy-first, enterprise-grade AI Agency OS designed to deploy autonomous digital workers. It integrates with your existing tech stack (MongoDB, Supabase, Postgres) and supports advanced agentic workflows including RAG, webhooks, and multi-step reasoning.

## Documentation
- /docs (Coming soon)
- /api/docs (Coming soon)

## Core Features
- Agents: Create and manage AI agents with specific roles.
- Knowledge Base: RAG pipeline with file and website ingestion.
- Analytics: Live monitoring of agent performance and costs.
- Tools: MCP support and external integrations via webhooks.

## Tech Stack
- Frontend: React, Vite, TailwindCSS (Elegant UI)
- Backend: Express, PostgreSQL (Drizzle ORM)
- AI: OpenAI, Anthropic, Google Gemini
